segments.text: I want to buy two tickets for tonight's concert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . How do you like your seats ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , here are your tickets in Row 13 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think they are too far from the stage . I want two in row 6 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . But you have to pay another $ 10 .
segments.speaker: S2
